content: if you are comfortable with knitting in the round these leg warmers are really so easy to make of course if you don t want super long thigh high leg warmers you can stop knitting at whatever length suits you you will need 1 cake lion brand mandala yarn thunderbird split into 2 equal balls see below 4mm circular needles with long cable for magic loop method or 4mm dpns yarn needle scissors digital kitchen scale recommended yarn winder optional
